Time constraints: With busy work schedules, employees may not have time to exercise during work hours.
Limited space: The office may not have enough space to accommodate a fitness program.
Cost: The cost of implementing a fitness program may be too high for the company to bear.
Lack of resources: The company may not have the necessary resources (e.g. equipment, facilities) to implement a fitness program.
Lack of expertise: The company may not have the expertise to design and implement an effective fitness program.
